@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Creates a HTML canvas widget in your mobile application. Example Here is an example of how to use the canvas widget. 

 var canvas = new qx.ui.mobile.embed.Canvas();
 canvas.setWidth(150);
 canvas.setHeight(150);
 this.getContent().add(canvas);
 var ctx = canvas.getContext2d();
 ctx.strokeStyle = '#3D72C9';
 ctx.beginPath();
 ctx.arc(75,85,50,0,Math.PI*2,true);
 ctx.moveTo(110,85);
 ctx.arc(75,85,35,0,Math.PI,false);
 ctx.moveTo(65,75);
 ctx.arc(60,75,5,0,Math.PI*2,true);
 ctx.moveTo(95,75);
 ctx.arc(90,75,5,0,Math.PI*2,true);
 ctx.stroke();

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the canvas element [W3C-HMTL5]

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set the width attribute of the canvas element. This property controls the size of the canvas coordinate space.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the width attribute of the canvas element

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set the height attribute of the canvas element. This property controls the size of the canvas coordinate space.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the height attribute of the canvas element

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the canvas' 2D rendering context [W3C-HTML5]. All drawing operations are performed on this context.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.
